page.title: 15Family Support in Stowmarket
page.content: There is a lot of help for old people. There is sheltered accommodation in Iliffe Way where wardens are always available, as well as Stow Lodge, a large nursing home. Various clubs such as 'The Daffodils' and 'Silver Threads' organise outings for them. Physically and mentally handicapped people also receive a great deal of help. Special mini-buses take children to the schools in Ipswich eg Belstead Special School. Clubs are available eg the 'Gateway Club' and the 'Phabs'. Mentally handicapped adults can attend the Social Education Centre where they learn crafts such as pottery and gardening. They also attend the clubs mentioned earlier.
